context: Hello! Can I help you find a movie?
Hello that'd be great. What would you suggest?
What is your favorite kind of movie? Or, what are you in the mood for?
I like everything but my all time favorite it horror movies.
Yes, I love horror movies. I enjoy the old ones. How about something like Halloween (1978) ? Always a crowd-pleaser.
Yes that is one of my all time favorite movies. Right up there with A Nightmare on Elm Street (1984) .
resp: I never get tired of the old movies like Phantasm (1979) . The dialogue is a bit stiff, but the concept and scares are great. Freddy Krueger is the man of horror for sure!

context.content: Hi! What kind of movies do you like?
I'm into thrilling and adrenaline-pumping action movies, exciting and daring adventure movies, and suspenseful thrillers with gripping suspense. What do you have in mind?
context.feelings: I love discovering hidden gems and underrated movies. It's so thrilling to uncover lesser-known films and genres. I hope the recommender can suggest something exciting and daring for me.

context.content: That sounds interesting! Can you tell me more about The Transporter (2002)? What's the storyline and the main highlights of the movie?
context.feelings: I haven't seen The Transporter (2002) yet. I wonder if it's thrilling and adrenaline-pumping enough for me. The recommender seems to know their action movies, but I need more details before I can decide.

context.content: It's a high action movie with Jason Statham. It's about a Transporter who is hired by a drug cartel to steal a package from a drug dealer. It has a lot of high action and driving scenes.
That sounds like a thrilling action movie! I'm definitely interested in The Transporter (2002). Can you tell me more about the adventure and suspense elements in the movie?
context.feelings: I love discovering action movies with thrilling driving scenes and high-octane action. The Transporter (2002) seems to have the adrenaline-pumping action I enjoy. The recommender did a great job in recommending a movie that aligns with my preferences. I appreciate the effort!

context.content: The Trans Transporter 2 (2002) is a high-speed chase movie. It is a very thrilling chase movie with lots of high speed chases.
Wow, The Transporter (2002) sounds like a thrilling and action-packed movie with high-speed chases and adrenaline-pumping scenes. I'm definitely up for it! [END]
context.feelings: I'm excited to uncover this thrilling action movie! The high-speed chases and adrenaline-pumping action scenes sound like exactly what I'm looking for. I can't wait to watch The Transporter (2002) and experience the adventure and suspense it offers. This recommender has really hit the mark with this recommendation. I'm looking forward to watching it!
